entry.title: Introduction
entry.content:
Welcome to this newly created blog. As i haven’t thought of a good name yet, the github pages domain will have to do ಠ_ಠ

The primary goal is to have a place for publishing programming tutorials and related explanations. Having written quite a lot on reddit and in private exchanges, this allows me to put it in a more structured form and make it accessible to the public.

It also doubles as a central place for hosting code examples for github repositories or other projects.

Enjoy your stay~!
